channel.title: CVE Feed for Telepad -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Telepad -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-45477|2024-08-03T14:17:03.626Z -- telepad -- telepad
item.description: Telepad allows remote unauthenticated users to send instructions to the server to execute arbitrary code without any previous authorization or authentication. CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H

item.title: CVE-2022-45478|2024-08-03T14:17:03.591Z -- telepad -- telepad
item.description: Telepad allows an attacker (in a man-in-the-middle position between the server and a connected device) to see all data (including keypresses) in cleartext. CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N

item.title: CVE-2022-45480|2024-08-03T14:17:03.951Z -- telepad -- pc%20keyboard%20wifi%20%26%20bluetooth
item.description: PC Keyboard WiFi & Bluetooth allows an attacker (in a man-in-the-middle position between the server and a connected device) to see all data (including keypresses) in cleartext. CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N
